text: 9.20-21: Mt 14.36 naŋga, Mk 5.25 naŋga, Lu 8.43Kamatɨhi navundi 12 simbi sɨkwɨ ñaŋgwɨ yɨvukuvɨta kɨndi ŋambɨ nuŋambi ambami, Nuŋandɨ mɨkwɨrɨ kuta nɨñɨ ñapɨruvu kumandamata tɨmbusarata ndahara avindɨrɨman, vami. Kamavata Jisasɨndu kutɨvu arɨhañɨ pata kumandamata nuŋandɨ mɨkwɨrɨ kuta hañɨ tɨmbusarami.Navundi ñaŋgwɨ yɨvukuvɨhuvɨ ŋambɨ Jisas ndu mɨkwɨrɨyɨ tɨmbusarata avɨndɨmi
